Text: Whether this weather is allowed to appear.
The minimum cycle that this weather can occur
Weighted chance of this weather occurring when rolling for weather
The minimum day when this weather occurs.
The maximum day when this weather occurs.
The first time this weather occurs, its duration is multiplied by this percentage.
Number of cycles until the weather reaches full (100%) duration.

The maximum additional multiplier for the monsoon weather at maximum. This value is affected by handicap like Duration.
Default value: 350(%) meaning when no handicap is applied (default cycle 5), all water sources strength is at 350%.
Export and import settings. It's recommended to make a save then reload it after importing settings to ensure everything is applied correctly.
The game's default temperate weather. No effects.
The game's default hazardous drought weather. Water sources stop producing water.
The game's default hazardous bad tide weather. All water sources produce badwater.

Benign weather. Effects:
- All tiles are watered and no land contamination occurs.
- Applies Wet Fur when Beavers are not in the buildings.
- 25% shorter than the usual temperate season (default settings)
Hazardous weather. All water sources increase their output, at 350% maximum with handicap applied. Configurable via the Monsoon modifier.
'Hazardous' weather with no negative effect. All water sources produce fresh water. Very short.
The weathers that will be affected by this modifier
Whether this modifier can appear for this weather
Chance of this modifier occurring when this weather occurs
The minimum cycle that this modifier can occur for this weather

Settings changes will not take effect until the next weather cycle.
<YellowHighlight>- You should make a save before editing.
- You should make a save and reload that save after editing.</YellowHighlight>
This weather has no settings to configure.
All water sources stop producing water.
All tiles are watered, no land contamination occurs, and applies Wet Fur when Beavers are not in buildings.
All water sources increase their output, up to a maximum.
All water sources produce fresh water.

Change the rain visual effects settings. These settings do not affect gameplay. The rain effect is shared between many weathers. These settings are global (not per-save) and are not exported/imported with profiles.

You can adjust or disable the Rain effect at any time but to re-enable, please reload your save.
Adjust the intensity of the rain visual effects (particles per map cell). Default 0.2.
Adjust the maximum number of rain particles on screen. Default 1000.
Configure the different stages of each cycle. With this mod, you can have as many stages in each cycle as you want.
The chance of this stage being skipped when deciding a cycle
The chance of benign weather occurring during this stage
Once the weather duration is decided, this stage multiplies that duration by this value
If enabled, the hazardous weather duration will always be shown in the weather panel (the game's default behavior). If disabled, you only know 3 days in advance before the next weather starts.
